law.catch_line: Certain jury trials of right of property abolished.
law.text: Trials by juries summoned by sheriffs or other officers, of the right of property taken by them under execution or rent attachment, are abolished.
law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 91, sec. 44. -- Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 659.
